promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a massive mythical gorilla grass-type holding a dark sword. It can be found in woods-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or grass. Ony answer with the generated name:

It can be found in woods-like environments It has the following abilities: jungle-healing. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word gorilla or grass or the ability names. generatedDescription: Hulgorus: A giant, mythical ape living in lush areas. Wanders among trees, healing the land with its presence.
